Title: Should I Leverage Debt to Speed My Business Growth?
Description:
Today we’ll hear about: 

  • An owner looking to leverage debt to rapidly expand his business 
  • A businesswoman who’s trying to avoid bankruptcy after a costly mistake 
  • How customer service defines company success 
  • A father hoping to bring his kids into the family business
